attributes.action: Help Cancer patients with wage funding
attributes.additional_details: Help Cancer patients by equaling their wage from government funding, to enable them to fully recover whilst having treatment and not have to worry about working to pay for monthly outgoings they are committed too, ie: morgage/rent, bills etc., financial help from the government would stop the patient and their family from extra unnecessary pressure and stress, which in turn would help greatly with the patients recovery, with being able to have a choice to work or not. Please help and let them be able to relax and recover.
